title: Client Chrashing
body: I recently installed the new alpha client, and recently my regular client has been crashing a lot, mainly when I get a couple of seconds in to draft champion select( the reason i'm using the old client ) and when I open the hextech inventory.

replies.body:
Since both draft-modes and Hextech crafting rely on a steady connection, it's likely that there are small dips in your connection that cause the crash. If your client drops connection enough, it can disconnect from the platform entirely and cause the client to crash. As a first step, I recommend working through [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which offers the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if you notice any change.
